description.integration: ClickHouse is a fast, open-source columnar database designed for real-time analytics. It excels at handling large datasets and complex queries with high performance, making it ideal for data warehousing and business intelligence

ai_description.integration: The ClickHouse activity executes SQL queries on a ClickHouse database, ideal for real-time analytics and handling large datasets; use it when you need high-performance data retrieval and analysis in data warehousing or business intelligence workflows, specifically through the operation.query function.
